thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: PMB

author: PMB
title: PMB
text: I can only rave about Thriftbooks! Their search tool is easy to use, and orders are easy to place. The quality of the used books I have received has been as described, with the exception of only one book out of the many dozens I have purchased. I emailed Thriftbooks, and they were very responsive and apologetic. They quickly resolved the issue. Oh, and the prices are excellent too! ... especially for the used books.
